variable.name: enable
variable.description: DAQ is active when set to 0 and disabled when set to 0.

variable.name: nMaxFiles
variable.description: Maximum number of files in the ring buffer (oldest file will be overwritten).

variable.name: nTriggersPerFile
variable.description: Number of triggers stored in each file.

variable.name: rfFrequency
variable.description: Working RF frequency of the system. Must be constant.

variable.name: clockFrequency
variable.description: FPGA clock frequency (= raw ADC frequency). Must be constant.

variable.name: IQdetectionLength
variable.description: Number of raw ADC samples per IQ sample pair. Must be constant.

variable.name: samplingFrequencyFilter
variable.description: IQ sampling frequency as used for the IIR filters (i.e. the actual internal IQ sample frequency)

variable.name: samplingFrequencyAdc
variable.description: IQ sampling frequency as used for the ADC channels

variable.name: samplingFrequencyController
variable.description: IQ sampling frequency as used for the controller DAQ channels

variable.name: samplingFrequencyTables
variable.description: IQ sampling frequency as used for the control tables

variable.name: QLoaded
variable.description: Loaded Q used for the power computation

variable.name: shuntImpedance
variable.description: Normalised shunt imedance (r/Q) used for the power computation

variable.name: powerUnitConversion
variable.description: Factor to convert the SI prefixes of the amplitude-squared into the power (example: (1e6)^2/1e3 = 1e9 for MV->kW)

variable.name: zeroPhaseThreshold
variable.description: Minimum amplitude to display a non-zero phase

variable.name: tableLimit
variable.description: Limit of the I and Q proportional gain tables

variable.name: initialGain
variable.description: Gain before the start point, as the ratio of the full gain

variable.name: timeConstant
variable.description: Time constant for exponential gain scheduling

variable.name: functionSelect
variable.description: Gain function selection: 0=disabled; 1=sine function transition; 2=linear transition, 3=full sine wave; 4=exponential function

variable.name: cwMode
variable.description: If true, the pulse form parameters will be changed for contineous-wave operation

variable.name: delay
variable.description: Delay of pulse start after start of sampling area

variable.name: startTime
variable.description: Start time of extra flattop region

variable.name: startTime
variable.description: Start time of extra flattop region

variable.name: tableLimit
variable.description: Limit of the I and Q setpoint tables

variable.name: enable
variable.description: If true, the set point correction tables will be used

variable.name: I
variable.description: Set point correction table for I

variable.name: Q
variable.description: Set point correction table for Q

variable.name: enable
variable.description: Enable the cascaded scaling and rotation

variable.name: enable
variable.description: Enable the cascaded scaling and rotation

variable.name: IAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in I averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: QAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in Q averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeAverage
variable.description: Amplitude averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseAverage
variable.description: Phase averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation of amplitude over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation over the full pulse

variable.name: bitShift
variable.description: Number of bits to right-shift the vector sum in firmware

variable.name: IAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in I averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: QAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in Q averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeAverage
variable.description: Amplitude averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseAverage
variable.description: Phase averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation of amplitude over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation over the full pulse

variable.name: scale
variable.description: Feed forward scaling factor for flattop

variable.name: fillScale
variable.description: Feed forward scaling factor for filling phase

variable.name: enable
variable.description: If true, the user feed-forward tables will be used

variable.name: tableLimit
variable.description: Limit of the I and Q feed forward tables

variable.name: I
variable.description: Feed forward correction table for I

variable.name: Q
variable.description: Feed forward correction table for Q

variable.name: IAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in I averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: QAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in Q averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeAverage
variable.description: Amplitude averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseAverage
variable.description: Phase averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation of amplitude over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation over the full pulse

variable.name: lengthScale
variable.description: factor to scale with cavity length

variable.name: maximumPhaseOffset
variable.description: Maximum phase offset for phase modulation

variable.name: IAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in I averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: QAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in Q averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeAverage
variable.description: Amplitude averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseAverage
variable.description: Phase averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation of amplitude over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation over the full pulse

variable.name: IAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in I averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: QAverage
variable.description: Calibrated value in Q averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeAverage
variable.description: Amplitude averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseAverage
variable.description: Phase averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation of amplitude over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation over the full pulse

variable.name: reset
variable.description: Clear the interlock detection status when written to this variable

variable.name: interlockDetected
variable.description: Will be set to 1 if interlock is detected or 0 otherwise.

variable.name: threshold
variable.description: Threshold on vector sum amplitude for interlock detection

variable.name: cwMode
variable.description: If true, the pulse form parameters will be changed for contineous-wave operation

variable.name: maxIandQ
variable.description: Maximum I and Q values for the DAC offset allowed during calibration

variable.name: maxAmplitudeAfterCalibration
variable.description: Target amplitude to be achieved after optimisation

variable.name: nTriggersAverage
variable.description: Number of triggers to average over for the measurements

variable.name: requestMode
variable.description: MANUAL=1, RAMPUP=3, CLEAR_ERROR=4, ABORT=5, SWITCH_OFF=6, CALIBRATE_VM_OFFSET=7

variable.name: currentMode
variable.description: OFF=0, MANUAL=1, RAMPUP=3, ERROR=4, CW_AUTO=5, RAMP_NEW_SETPOINT=6, RAMP_NEW_PHASE=7, CALIBRATE_VM_OFFSET=8

variable.name: errorMessage
variable.description: Error message if currentMode is ERROR.

variable.name: initialSetpoint
variable.description: Initial amplitude set point for the rampup procedure

variable.name: allowedAmplitudeExcess
variable.description: Allowed excess of vector sum amplitude w.r.t. set point

variable.name: allowedError
variable.description: Allowed amplitude of error vector after output vector correction and/or in closed-loop operation for the rampup procedure

variable.name: stepsizeSetpoint
variable.description: Stepsize of amplitude setpoint for the rampup procedure

variable.name: stepsizeGain
variable.description: Stepsize of proportional gain for the rampup procedure

variable.name: deltaScale
variable.description: Allow scaling in the output vector correction in the range [1-x:1+x]

variable.name: rateScale
variable.description: Maximum change of the scaling factor in each correction step of the output vector correction

variable.name: ratePhase
variable.description: Maximum change of the phase in each correction step of the output vector correction

variable.name: maxIterations
variable.description: Maximum number of iterations of the output vector correction until rampup/allowedError must be reached

variable.name: targetError
variable.description: Target amplitude of error vector after output vector correction for the rampup procedure

variable.name: amplitudeStep
variable.description: Maximum step size for amplitude set-point changes in closed-loop operation

variable.name: phaseStep
variable.description: Maximum step size for phase set-point changes in closed-loop operation

variable.name: enable
variable.description: Enable the cascaded scaling and rotation

variable.name: limiterActive
variable.description: Flag whether the limiter was active during the pulse

variable.name: prelimiterActive
variable.description: Flag whether the pre-limiter was active during the pulse

variable.name: adcOverflow
variable.description: Flag whether the ADC was overflowing during the pulse

variable.name: limiterDisable
variable.description: Disable the limiter if set to 1

variable.name: vectorSumInclude
variable.description: Include channel in vector sum if set to 1

variable.name: raw
variable.description: RAW ADC data if RAW DAQ is enabled

variable.name: amplitudeAverage
variable.description: Amplitude averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseAverage
variable.description: Phase averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: powerAverage
variable.description: Power averaged over the full pulse

variable.name: amplitudeStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation of amplitude over the full pulse

variable.name: phaseStandardDeviation
variable.description: Standard deviation over the full pulse

variable.name: type
variable.description: 0: no filter, 1: notch, 2: low-pass, 3: block signal

variable.name: frequency
variable.description: Filter center/corner frequency (only for notch and low-pass filters)

variable.name: daqDecimation
variable.description: Decimation factor to reduce amplitude/phase resp. I/Q data transferred from the FPGA to the CPU. This allows to cover longer time periods at the cost of a lower sampling rate.
